## rult <img src='https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jvcasillas/hex_stickers/master/stickers/ds4ling.png' align='right' width='275px'/>

An R package of for downloading lexTALE data.

Last update: `r Sys.Date()`

### Overview

The purpose of this package is to provide functions that can be used to download LexTALE data. 

### Installation

You can install the development version from GitHub with:

```
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("jvcasillas/rult")
```
